original_text:
Thus the Lord became king in Jeshurun,
    when the heads of the people were gathered,
    all the tribes of Israel together.
korean_text: 여수룬에 왕이 있었으니 곧 백성의 수령이 모이고 이스라엘 모든 지파가 함께 한 때에로다

sentences.original_text: Thus the Lord became king in Jeshurun
when the heads of the people were gathered
all the tribes of Israel together
